title: i need some rp

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Dear Riot please can you give me 7 rp, i want to buy project zed. I had lot of work with this picture.

replies.body:
O.O That's really good!

Since we have to take a look at your account to process this request, we'll need you to make this request through a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.

how does this RP thing works? can i earn some if i answer questions about gameplay/coach people/teach stuff to inexperienced players?
*greedier than a vayne with flash up that spots 3 targets with single digit hp near a fed full hp zed
We actually made a video on it and uploaded it online. You can find it [here.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P_4GOOgLQOs) ^.^
